DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Performed Observation Outcome Report Date and Time ACT I2B2 CDM Diagnosis Date and Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen._Diagnosis date and time. If times dont exist in the source data, set HH:MM:SS to 00:00:00.
